## üîß SPARQL Verification Queries

### Query 1: Verify French Department Entities
```sparql
SELECT ?item ?itemLabel WHERE {
  VALUES ?name { "Vaucluse" "Dr√¥me" "Ard√®che" "Gard" }
  ?item rdfs:label ?name .
  ?item wdt:P31 wd:Q6465 .  # French department
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "fr,en". }
}
```

### Query 2: Search for VELUX Company
```sparql
SELECT ?item ?itemLabel ?website WHERE {
  ?item rdfs:label "VELUX"@en .
  ?item wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q4830453 .  # company
  OPTIONAL { ?item wdt:P856 ?website }
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en,fr". }
}
```

### Query 3: Search for Regional Construction Companies
```sparql
SELECT ?item ?itemLabel ?location WHERE {
  ?item wdt:P452 wd:Q859138 .  # construction industry
  ?item wdt:P131 ?location .
  ?location wdt:P131 wd:Q18338 .  # Provence region
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "fr,en". }
}
```
